docblock.description: domain a comma separated list of domains to show activity for.
docblock.long-description: The XFBML version defaults to the current domain

docblock.description: width the width of the plugin in pixels.
height the height of the plugin in pixels.
header specifies whether to show the Facebook header
colorscheme the color scheme for the plugin.
font the font to display in the plugin.
border_color the border color of the plugin
recommendations specifies whether to always show recommendations in the plugin.
docblock.long-description: If recommendations is set to true, the plugin will display recommendations in the bottom half

docblock.description: filter allows you to filter which URLs are shown in the plugin.
docblock.long-description: The plugin will only include URLs which contain the filter string in the first two path parameters of the URL. If nothing in the first two path parameters of the URL matches the filter, the URL will not be included. For example, if the 'domain' parameter is set to 'www.example.com' and the 'filter' parameter was set to '/section1/section2' then only pages which matched 'http://www.example.com/section1/section2/*' would be included in the activity feed section of this plugin. The filter parameter does not apply to any recommendations which may appear in this plugin (see above); Recommendations are based only on 'domain' parameter

docblock.description: linktarget This specifies the context in which content links are opened.
docblock.long-description: By default all links within the plugin will open a new window. If you want the content links to open in the same window, you can set this parameter to _top or _parent. Links to Facebook URLs will always open in a new window.

docblock.description: ref must be a comma separated list, consisting of at most 5 distinct items, each of length at least 1 and at most 15 characters drawn from the set '0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz_'.
docblock.long-description: Specifying a value for the ref attribute adds the 'fb_ref' parameter to the any links back to your domain which are clicked from within the plugin. Using different values for the ref parameter for different positions and configurations of this plugin within your pages allows you to track which instances are performing the best.

docblock.description: max_age the maximum age of a URL to show in the plugin.
docblock.long-description: The default is 0 (we dont take age into account). Otherwise the valid values are 1-180, which specifies the number of days. For example, if you specify '7' the plugin will only show URLs which were created in the past week.

docblock.description: type type to use, xfbml, html5, or iframe

docblock.description: href the URL for this Comments plugin.
docblock.long-description: News feed stories on Facebook will link to this URL

docblock.description: width the width of the plugin in pixels.
colorscheme the color scheme for the plugin.
num_posts the number of comments to show by default.
mobile whether to show the mobile-optimized version.

docblock.description: href the URL of the Facebook Page for this Like Box
width the width of the plugin in pixels.
height the height of the plugin in pixels.
docblock.long-description: The default height varies based on number of faces to display, and whether the stream is displayed. With the stream displayed, and 10 faces the default height is 556px. With no faces, and no stream the default height is 63px

docblock.description: colorscheme the color scheme for the plugin.
show_faces specifies whether or not to display profile photos in the plugin.
stream specifies whether to display a stream of the latest posts from the Page's wall
header specifies whether to display the Facebook header at the top of the plugin
border_color the border color of the plugin
force_wall for Places, specifies whether the stream contains posts from the Place's wall or just checkins from friends.
template template to use, xfbml, html5, or iframe

parse_markers.error: No page-level DocBlock was found in file inc/classes/model/class.AWD_facebook_likebox.php
No DocBlock was found for method likeboxHtml5()
No DocBlock was found for method likeboxXfbml()
No DocBlock was found for method likeboxIframe()

docblock.long-description: The XFBML version defaults to the current page

docblock.description: send specifies whether to include a Send button with the Like button.
docblock.long-description: This only works with the XFBML version

docblock.description: layout there are three options standard - displays social text to the right of the button and friends' profile photos below.
docblock.long-description: Minimum width: 225 pixels. Minimum increases by 40px if action is 'recommend' by and increases by 60px if send is 'true'. Default width: 450 pixels. Height: 35 pixels (without photos) or 80 pixels (with photos). button_count - displays the total number of likes to the right of the button. Minimum width: 90 pixels. Default width: 90 pixels. Height: 20 pixels box_count - displays the total number of likes above the button. Minimum width: 55 pixels. Default width: 55 pixels. Height: 65 pixels

docblock.description: show_faces specifies whether to display profile photos below the button (standard layout only)
width the width of the Like button
height the verb to display on the button.
action the width of the plugin in pixels.
font the font to display in the button.
colorscheme the color scheme for the like button.
ref a label for tracking referrals; must be less than 50 characters and can contain alphanumeric characters and some punctuation (currently +/=-.:_).
docblock.long-description: The ref attribute causes two parameters to be added to the referrer URL when a user clicks a link from a stream story about a Like action: fb_ref - the ref parameter fb_source - the stream type ('home', 'profile', 'search', 'other') in which the click occurred and the story type ('oneline' or 'multiline'), concatenated with an underscore.

docblock.description: type template to use, xfbml, html5, or iframe
